title: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] Error message not displayed when trying to open a file that is already opened in another editor
description: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] If file is already opened in one editor, cannot open in another editor (should give error msg)
OB: When attempting to open a file in the editor that is already opened in another editor, no error message or warning is displayed.
EB: However, there should be a warning or error message displayed indicating that the file is already opened in another editor.
SR:
1. Open a file in one editor.
2. Try to open the same file in another editor.
3. Verify that an error message or warning is displayed indicating that the file is already opened in another editor.
